data.title: Unit sales of the Animal Crossing series worldwide 2024
data.meta_description: Released in March 2020 for the Switch gaming console, Nintendo's Animal Crossing: New Horizons was a smash hit and has accumulated nearly 45.36 million unit sales as of March 2024.
